+    if (await canLaunchUrl(Uri.parse(url))) {
+      await launchUrl(Uri.parse(url));
+    } else {
+      print('Could not launch $url');
+    }
+  }
+

+    final Uri emailUri = Uri(
+      scheme: 'mailto',

+    if (await canLaunchUrl(emailUri)) {

+    } else {
